kubejs.ponder.heph_forge.text_5: Place down a Smithing Table in the center
kubejs.ponder.heph_forge2.text_1: Darkstone Pedestals can be placed like so, they hold items for the ritual
kubejs.ponder.heph_forge2.text_2: Arcane Crystal Obelisks can be placed in the same spaces and passively generate Aureal
